name: Grid:Locked
description: Grid:Locked is a city building puzzle game, with an interactive world, varied optional game mechanics - like driving, platforming, collectible hunting - and an engaging narrative.

name: Sword of Legendia
description: Sword of Legendia was a video game announced in 2006 by Namco Bandai Games, for the Wii. Despite the title's similarity to the Namco 2005 PlayStation 2 role-playing video game title, Tales of Legendia, it was confirmed by producer Tsutomu Gouda that it wasn't part of the Tales series. In a Japan Expo 2011 interview, the game was revealed to have been cancelled.

name: Cryonauts
description: MMO action Sci-fi game set in the future year of 2069 where you play as a cybernetic robot to eliminate other robots that represent Biomorph defence system, gameplay take place in Egypt near an ancient temple complex along the Nile river.

name: Lost on Jupiter
description:
A 2D side-scrolling survival base-building survival game!

Explore the unknown lands inside of the gas giant, Jupiter.
Expand and build a base of operations for safety.
Exploit the new mineral to fuel and create your machines.
Exterminate the growing horde of enemies as they outnumber you more and more every day.

name: BandMaster
description: Sin descripción

name: Crysis: Back to Hell
description: Sin descripción

name: Donkey Kong Plus
description: Donkey Kong Plus was an updated version of the Game Boy Donkey Kong. The only known difference between the original and Plus, aside from the graphics, was the addition of a level designer to be used through the Nintendo GameCube for players to create their own levels with. However, the game vanished the following year, and was replaced by Mario vs. Donkey Kong, with the level editor gone and the graphics replaced with pre-rendered graphics. However, the game's sequel, Mario vs. Donkey Kong 2: March of the Minis had this feature and took advantage of Wi-Fi Connection.

name: Kirby for Nintendo GameCube
description:
A cancelled Kirby game for the Nintendo GameCube. It would be a 2D platformer with 3D graphics, and one of the features announced would be a 4 player co-op. Even though the game was never released, many of its features would later be used in new games in the series, like the graphic style in the Return to Dreamland and the co-op in Star Allies.

This is the first of three different iterations of Kirby games that were cancelled around the same time. The other ones are an isometric-view platformer and a pop-up style 2D platformer.

name: Roll-o-Rama
description: Roll-o-Rama was a retooling of Kirby Tilt 'n' Tumble 2, without Kirby elements. It was cancelled just like its former version.

name: Kirby Tilt 'n' Tumble 2
description: Kirby Tilt 'n' Tumble 2 was an unreleased Kirby game and a planned sequel to Kirby Tilt 'n' Tumble, and it would have have been played on the Nintendo GameCube and Game Boy Advance at the same time. This was made possible by using the Game Boy Advance as a game controller via the link cable. As its name suggests, Kirby Tilt 'n' Tumble 2 was planned to feature the tilt controls that appeared in its predecessor. Kirby Tilt 'n' Tumble 2 was originally scheduled for a May 2002 release for Japan, but the Kirby theme was eventually scrapped. Kirby Tilt 'n' Tumble 2 was reintroduced as a game starring an ordinary marble, titled Roll-O-Rama; this version was shown at E3 2002 but was ultimately cancelled itself.

name: Adam and Eve
description:
Adam and Eve is cancelled Nintendo game which became Super Mario 128, and would later become the basis of the Pikmin series.

In Adam and Eve, the player would oversee the life of two human beings. The game was cancelled and was seen to be not very interactive.

name: Game Boy Music
description: Game Boy Music was a rhythm game starring Barbara the Bat, which was cancelled. The game itself was a retooling of the cancelled Game Boy game called Pocket Music. Barbara the Bat would later receive a her debut in Daigassou: Band Brothers for the Nintendo DS.

name: Tabbers
description: Craft, Build, and Explore while experiencing the peaceful weather and environment as you explore your new home - in the sky!

name: Queen Sized
description: MS-Paint styled, RPG Roguelike about matresses

name: The Great Circle
description: The Great Circle is an open world animal survival experience set in an African wildlife preserve.

name: Room Smash
description: Room Smash is a casual sandbox physics simulator with a variety of rooms and weapons to simulate destruction.

name: Tom Clancy's Splinter Cell
description: Tom Clancy's Splinter Cell is a remake that will draw from the rich canvas of the brand. The game will be rebuilt from the ground up using Ubisoft's own Snowdrop engine to deliver new-generation visuals and gameplay, and the dynamic lighting and shadows the series is known for.

name: Mortal Kombat: Solano Edition
description: It is a good edition and compilation of several old school MKs with classic characters, stages, music and even brings editions of characters of the new MKs of current consoles and edits of characters not seen before

name: The Forge Arena
description: The Forge is the first tactical FPS competitive video game utilizing the blockchain through non-fungible tokens or NFTs. Aimed to be the first Esport in the Metaverse, The Forge offers a unique and personalized 5v5 experience where all players start out on the same playing field. Players use NFT Generators to create, collect, use, sell and trade in-game NFT cosmetics for their weapons, attachments, and avatars. Spark, the in-game currency is gained by players from simply playing the game and is collected through the battle pass, loot boxes, community giveaways and, exclusive tournaments. Generators and Spark are combined to create the unique and rare NFTs that bring The Forge to life.

name: Skate or Don't!
description: Skate or Don't! is a massively multiplayer online arcade game.

name: AiliA
description:
Ailia gets lost in a mysterious world.

She has no special power but going into the mirror and walking on the reflections.

Traveling through the maze, playing with reflections, revealing her past with the help of the mirror, her only friend in this world.

Try to use your understanding of mirror reflections to solve the puzzles and help Ailia find her way home.

AiliA is a tricky puzzle game where mirror reflections are made real. Manipulate mirrors and guide Ail through a stunning, reflected world to save her long lost "twin sister" Lia, who was captured inside a mirror.

name: Average4k
description: Average4k is a Rhythm Game inspired by other four key rhythm games like Stepmania (Etterna), Quaver, and Osu! that allows you to play almost any chart format with your friends in an instant, you'll be able to drag and drop your folders and immediately play with an insanely customizable experience.

name: Juego-Matica
description: Sin descripción

name: Squad Battles: First World War
description: Squad Battles: First World War allows you to experience the technical and tactical advancements of that conflict, and the terrible battles that were carried out. Can you survive the horrific campaigns of the First World War?

name: 8 Bit Armies: Limited Edition
description: Sin descripción

name: King of the Dwarves: Underground City Builder
description: Build an epic kingdom inside a mountain in this underground city builder. Mine and build in a vast procedurally generated 3D world. Gather resources, research technology, train warriors and engineers, forge weapons, fight monsters and manage hundreds of units. Become the King of the Dwarves!

name: Ruler of the Earth
description: Sin descripción

name: Surge Breaker
description: How quickly can you obliterate the crawler menace in this top-down action-strategy hybrid?

name: Endless Martian Pit
description: a game made in Brackeys Game Jam 2020.1

name: Made of DIrt
description: I continue living this cyclical quiet life, but these strange yet familiar dreams of mine keep appearing...

name: Super Mario Star World
description: Super Mario Star World is an upcoming Super Mario 64 DS ROM hack/mod, developed by SKELUX, and the sequel to the famous Super Mario 64 mod Super Mario Star Road.

name: Resident Evil: Mortal Night
description: Mortal Night is a mod for Resident Evil 2 Sourcenext that adds a completely new story and radically changes the gameplay by adding new mechanics. The latest version, REbirth edition, is no longer standalone, but it enhances the experience even more and brings you the possibility of playing in areas from other classic Resident Evil titles. Now randomization has been included, which means that items, enemies, door locks and cutscenes will vary (slightly or greatly) every time you start a new playthrough. In addition to this, the order in which you go to the different areas and the choices you make will also affect the story and gameplay. "Replayable" is the perfect adjective for this mod. This is a must-play for any fan of classic Resident Evil games. Right now only the first episode (2-3 hours long) is available for this updated version, but episodes 2 and 3 are being worked on, and they will bring even more novelties.

name: Dungeon Universe
description: Dungeon Universe is an upcoming fantasy MMORPG where players connect their gaming enthusiasm with latest blockchain technology. It's an open seamless world that allows for endless possibilities. You can explore the world, participate in trading, complete dungeons, quest and much more.

name: Regular Show: Battle of the Behemoths
description: Battle of the Behemoths is an all-out duel of destruction between Regular Show's most colossal characters. Go one vs. one against gigantic warriors like Baby Ducks, Evil Geese, Guardian of Secrets, VCR-bitrator, Snowballs and the Warlock. Each character has an arsenal of kicks, punches and unique special moves to take down your opponent.

name: Quest for the Code
description: STARBRIGHT Asthma CD-ROM Game: Quest for the Code is an interactive asthma adventure game developed by Starbright.

name: Wildland: Initial Attack
description: Stamp out fires with your friends using planes, helicopters, and your hands in a huge beautiful world. Customize your character. Play online or LAN. Save towns, people, animals, and the forest. Build your base to get better tools and vehicles. Jump into the fiery abyss as a smokejumper and see if you can survive!

name: Ovus Nova
description: DUPLICATE or DETONATE! A unique singleplayer strategy game.

name: The Morphine Western Revenge
description: The Morphine Western Revenge is a Western top-down shooter with a focus on fast-paced, decisive, and tactical combat. You play as a young Native American woman in search of her sister, who went missing in the aftermath of your tribe's destruction at the hands of the military. Your only companions are the gun at your hip and a hypodermic needle full of morphine.

name: An Aware Guy in the Past
description: Welcome to the future! Our civilization has advanced to a new stage in evolution! Cars now fly and houses look like UFOs! It's amazing! But also very boring... that's why you go back to the past because life was just better back then. But of course, with you comes all the knowledge of your time, and it may have some consequences...

Customize, level up and equip your hero with a massive array of options and skill charts as you delve into the mysteries. With hundreds of side quests and adventures, the story and challenges never end. Discover new items and rewards as you dive into the mysteries of Ur.

Swing around the environment, run, jump and get the keys to advance in your ninja training and make long noodles by swinging in them, but be careful if you do it too long, you will have to make a new noodle.

name: More of a Kind
description: A 3D puzzle platformer where you help the Flandres get to the goal. But their number keep on increasing. Move multiple Flandres at the same time using ASWD keys. If one of your Flandres falls, you lose the game. You can also use the left and right arrows to orbit the camera (sometime looking at a different angle is the key to solving a puzzle).

name: Lampyridae Matsuri

name: Pandemic of the Forgotten Virus
description: Pandemic of the Forgotten Virus is a local multiplayer bullet hell shooter game where 2 players can compete with each other or an AI to try and defeat each other and reach the stratosphere. This game is heavily inspired by both phantasmagoria Touhou games, but the catch is that we are using a neural network for our AI with genetic algorithm unlike conventional means. The player plays as the shrine maiden Megu or witch Kiara against another player or an AI, hereafter referred as “rival”, with the objective of shooting down enemies while dodging bullets, the player gets points as they defeat enemies which they can exchange to use their ultimate ability to make the game harder for their rival by spawning bullets and other enemies on their screen.

This single-player open-world action game will introduce an original story set in the DC Universe and allow players to become Diana of Themyscira in the fight to unite her Amazon family and the humans from the modern world.

Village Tanuki is a narrative based, maze chase game.

You are playing as Jun, one of many tanukis (Japanese raccoon dog) that works in a certain tanuki group in a forest. The group is infamous for their excellent job at foraging and distributing berries throughout other tanukis in the forest. Your job is to collect berries from human villages to please your boss. Can you do it?
